00026 /*
00027  *
00028  * Network Request Scheduler (NRS) First-in First-out (FIFO) policy
00029  *
00030  */
00031 
00032 #ifndef _LUSTRE_NRS_FIFO_H
00033 #define _LUSTRE_NRS_FIFO_H
00034 
00035 /* \name fifo
00036  *
00037  * FIFO policy
00038  *
00039  * This policy is a logical wrapper around previous, non-NRS functionality.
00040  * It dispatches RPCs in the same order as they arrive from the network. This
00041  * policy is currently used as the fallback policy, and the only enabled policy
00042  * on all NRS heads of all PTLRPC service partitions.
00043  * @{
00044  */
00045 
00049 struct nrs_fifo_head {
00053         struct ptlrpc_nrs_resource      fh_res;
00057         struct list_head                fh_list;
00061         __u64                           fh_sequence;
00062 };
00063 
00064 struct nrs_fifo_req {
00065         struct list_head        fr_list;
00066         __u64                   fr_sequence;
00067 };
00068 
00070 #endif
